mapper.insert: INSERT service_list (SERVICE_ID, SERVICE_NAME, SERVICE_SUMMARY, APPLY_METHOD, APPLY_DATE, AGENCY_CODE, DEPT_NAME, VIEWS, AGENCY_TYPE, USER_CRITERA, SERVICE_FIELD, PHONE) VALUES (#{SERVICE_ID}, #{SERVICE_NAME}, #{SERVICE_SUMMARY}, #{APPLY_METHOD}, #{APPLY_DATE}, #{AGENCY_CODE}, #{DEPT_NAME}, #{VIEWS}, #{AGENCY_TYPE}, #{USER_CRITERA}, #{SERVICE_FIELD}, #{PHONE})

INSERT service_detail (SERVICE_ID, SUPPORT_TYPE, SERVICE_NAME, SERVICE_PURPOSE, APPLY_DATE, SUPPORT_TARGET, SELECTION_CRITERIA, APP_CONTENTS, APPLY_METHOD, DOCUMENT, RECEPTION, CONTACT, APP_URL, MODIFY_DATE, AGENCY_NAME, STATUTE) VALUES (#{SERVICE_ID}, #{SUPPORT_TYPE}, #{SERVICE_NAME}, #{SERVICE_PURPOSE}, #{APPLY_DATE}, #{SUPPORT_TARGET}, #{SELECTION_CRITERIA}, #{APP_CONTENTS}, #{APPLY_METHOD}, #{DOCUMENT}, #{RECEPTION}, #{CONTACT}, #{APP_URL}, #{MODIFY_DATE}, #{AGENCY_NAME}, #{STATUTE})

INSERT support_conditions (SERVICE_ID, MALE, FEMALE, AGE_START, AGE_END, INCOME_0_50, INCOME_51_75, INCOME_76_100, INCOME_101_200, INCOME_OVER_200, NO_BABY, PREGNANT, BIRTH_ADOPT, FARM_WORKER, FISH_WORKER, LIVESTOCK_WORKER, FOREST_WORKER, ELEMENTARY, MI_STDNT, HI_STDNT, GR_STDNT, NOT_APLCB, WORKER, NON_WORKER, MLTCL_FMLY, NORTH_DFT, SP_GC_FMLY, SNG_FMLY, NONE_APPLY, MLT_CHLD, HOMELESS, NEW_TRNSF, EX_FMLY, SOON_BSNS, IN_BSNS, NON_BSNS, FOOD_BSNS, MNF_BSNS, ETC_BSNS, SMALL_COP, SOCIAL_COP, FACILITY, MNF_COP, FFF_COP, ICT_COP, ETC_COP, DISABLED_PERSON, NATIONAL_VETERANS, SICK_PERSON, SERVICE_NAME) VALUES (#{SERVICE_ID}, #{MALE}, #{FEMALE}, #{AGE_START}, #{AGE_END}, #{INCOME_0_50}, #{INCOME_51_75}, #{INCOME_76_100}, #{INCOME_101_200}, #{INCOME_OVER_200}, #{NO_BABY}, #{PREGNANT}, #{BIRTH_ADOPT}, #{FARM_WORKER}, #{FISH_WORKER}, #{LIVESTOCK_WORKER}, #{FOREST_WORKER}, #{ELEMENTARY}, #{MI_STDNT}, #{HI_STDNT}, #{GR_STDNT}, #{NOT_APLCB}, #{WORKER}, #{NON_WORKER}, #{MLTCL_FMLY}, #{NORTH_DFT}, #{SP_GC_FMLY}, #{SNG_FMLY}, #{NONE_APPLY}, #{MLT_CHLD}, #{HOMELESS}, #{NEW_TRNSF}, #{EX_FMLY}, #{SOON_BSNS}, #{IN_BSNS}, #{NON_BSNS}, #{FOOD_BSNS}, #{MNF_BSNS}, #{ETC_BSNS}, #{SMALL_COP}, #{SOCIAL_COP}, #{FACILITY}, #{MNF_COP}, #{FFF_COP}, #{ICT_COP}, #{ETC_COP}, #{DISABLED_PERSON}, #{NATIONAL_VETERANS}, #{SICK_PERSON}, #{SERVICE_NAME})
mapper.update: UPDATE service_detail SET SUPPORT_TYPE=#{SUPPORT_TYPE}, SERVICE_NAME=#{SERVICE_NAME}, SERVICE_PURPOSE=#{SERVICE_PURPOSE}, APPLY_DATE=#{APPLY_DATE}, SUPPORT_TARGET=#{SUPPORT_TARGET}, SELECTION_CRITERIA=#{SELECTION_CRITERIA}, APP_CONTENTS=#{APP_CONTENTS}, APPLY_METHOD=#{APPLY_METHOD}, DOCUMENT=#{DOCUMENT}, RECEPTION=#{RECEPTION}, CONTACT=#{CONTACT}, APP_URL=#{APP_URL}, MODIFY_DATE=#{MODIFY_DATE}, AGENCY_NAME=#{AGENCY_NAME}, STATUTE=#{STATUTE} WHERE SERVICE_NAME = #{SERVICE_ID}

UPDATE support_conditions SET MALE=#{MALE}, FEMALE=#{FEMALE}, AGE_START=#{AGE_START}, AGE_END=#{AGE_END}, INCOME_0_50=#{INCOME_0_50}, INCOME_51_75=#{INCOME_51_75}, INCOME_76_100=#{INCOME_76_100}, INCOME_101_200=#{INCOME_101_200}, INCOME_OVER_200=#{INCOME_OVER_200}, NO_BABY=#{NO_BABY}, PREGNANT=#{PREGNANT}, BIRTH_ADOPT=#{BIRTH_ADOPT}, FARM_WORKER=#{FARM_WORKER}, FISH_WORKER=#{FISH_WORKER}, LIVESTOCK_WORKER=#{LIVESTOCK_WORKER}, FOREST_WORKER=#{FOREST_WORKER}, ELEMENTARY=#{ELEMENTARY}, MI_STDNT=#{MI_STDNT}, HI_STDNT=#{HI_STDNT}, GR_STDNT=#{GR_STDNT}, NOT_APLCB=#{NOT_APLCB}, WORKER=#{WORKER}, NON_WORKER=#{NON_WORKER}, MLTCL_FMLY=#{MLTCL_FMLY}, NORTH_DFT=#{NORTH_DFT}, SP_GC_FMLY=#{SP_GC_FMLY}, SNG_FMLY=#{SNG_FMLY}, NONE_APPLY=#{NONE_APPLY}, MLT_CHLD=#{MLT_CHLD}, HOMELESS=#{HOMELESS}, NEW_TRNSF=#{NEW_TRNSF}, EX_FMLY=#{EX_FMLY}, SOON_BSNS=#{SOON_BSNS}, IN_BSNS=#{IN_BSNS}, NON_BSNS=#{NON_BSNS}, FOOD_BSNS=#{FOOD_BSNS}, MNF_BSNS=#{MNF_BSNS}, ETC_BSNS=#{ETC_BSNS}, SMALL_COP=#{SMALL_COP}, SOCIAL_COP=#{SOCIAL_COP}, FACILITY=#{FACILITY}, MNF_COP=#{MNF_COP}, FFF_COP=#{FFF_COP}, ICT_COP=#{ICT_COP}, ETC_COP=#{ETC_COP}, DISABLED_PERSON=#{DISABLED_PERSON}, NATIONAL_VETERANS=#{NATIONAL_VETERANS}, SICK_PERSON=#{SICK_PERSON}, SERVICE_NAME=#{SERVICE_NAME} WHERE SERVICE_NAME = #{SERVICE_ID}
